articles.title: Mádé Kuti sings no more wars - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: After a successful tour across Europe with his father, Afrobeat royalty and previous Grammy nominee, Mádé Kuti is back with another didactic and groovy bop.
articles.content: After a successful tour across Europe with his father, Afrobeat royalty and previous Grammy nominee, Mádé Kuti is back with another didactic and groovy bop. In No More Wars, the singer, composer and … [+1405 chars]
